Project Description
A small library for SILVERLIGHT. Included controls: table, math label, numeric box. Also an extension method to make updating UI in threads easy.

Features:

  1. Easily update any UI control from any thread by using RunOnUI helper.
  2. Display formulas with MathLabel control.
  3. Generate tables with Table control.
  4. Display numeric values with NumberLabel control.
  5. Accept numeric values with NumberBox input control.
